Title: Relates to quality standards for internet service providers
Summary: Directs the public service commission to establish quality of service standards, minimum performance levels, customer-specific credits, and reporting requirements that shall apply to each internet service provider.
LawCode: Amd Art 11 Art Head, ยง212, add ยง231, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to quality standards for internet service providers
